startups.name: Rentberry
startups.tagline: The first global home rental platform with full automation!
highlights: Backed by a tier-1 VC firm

problem.intro: The Home Rental Market Needs Innovation

solution.intro: Despite many other industries having been successfully disrupted in recent years (such as retail, social media, and transportation), the home rental market has remained largely unchanged. Rentberry is changing that with its fully digital rental experience.

product.intro: Fully Digital Rental Experience, Despite many other industries having been successfully disrupted in recent years (such as retail, social media.

traction.intro: We are proud of the fact that many prominent individuals from the real estate, legal, and finance sectors have shared our vision for the future of the home rental industry, entrusting us with their investments.

customers.intro: In 2022, Rentberry had more than 2 million monthly active users (MAU) from over 50 countries. The top five locations included New York, Los Angeles, London, Berlin, and Paris.

business_model.intro: Rentberry utilizes the 'Freemium' business model, which allows for several tasks to be performed free of charge. The Rentberry platform has a great value proposition for both landlords and tenants.

market.intro: Home renting has become an economic and lifestyle choice for 41% of Americans, 56% of the Swiss, and 40% of Germans, to name just a few countries. Currently, there are over 641 million rental units worldwide, with around 2.3 billion people living in long-term rentals. The market is massive and is only getting bigger!

competition.intro: Rentberry's main competitors include Zillow, Trulia, and StreetEasy. However, Rentberry differentiates itself from these competitors by offering a fully digital rental experience and by being the only global home rental platform.

vision_and_strategy.intro:
Rentberry has developed technology that disrupts the residential and senior housing rental markets: 

 1.The Rentberry platform, which provides a fully digital rental experience for both landlords and tenants.

team.name: Alex Lubinsky
team.title: CEO
team.bio: Hammed Olawale is a seasoned real estate investor and entrepreneur who has completed 18 real estate transactions in the past three years, transacting over $5.3 million in real estate deals.

team.title: COO
team.bio: Jane Doe is a seasoned real estate professional with over 10 years of experience in the industry. She has a proven track record of success in managing and developing real estate projects.

team.name: John Smith
team.title: CFO
team.bio: John Smith is a seasoned financial professional with over 15 years of experience in the real estate industry. He has a proven track record of success in managing the finances of real estate projects.

testimonials.name: Fisayo Fosudo
testimonials.title: Investor
testimonials.testimonial: I am so happy with my purchase of Project Balogun 3.0. It is a great investment opportunity that offers me a steady income and a hassle-free experience. The apartments are well-maintained and the management team is very responsive.

testimonials.name: Jane Doe
testimonials.title: Investor
testimonials.testimonial: Project Balogun 3.0 is a fantastic investment opportunity. The project is well-managed and the team is experienced and knowledgeable. I am confident that this project will be a success and I am excited to be a part of it.

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.title: Investor
testimonials.testimonial: I am very impressed with Project Balogun 3.0. The project is well-planned and the team is highly motivated. I am confident that this project will be a success and I am excited to be a part of it.
